name: AIKODE
description:
AIKODE (or AI-KODE) is an immersive action role-playing game solo developed by ACE. Featuring colossal bosses and intricate combat mechanics, players can explore a vast world filled with diverse cities, ranging from a cyberpunk metropolis to steampunk-themed towns and even a faithful replica of Tokyo.

Get ready to traverse this expansive world on foot, on a motorcycle, or even take to the skies with your own wings. With hundreds of NPCs whose behaviors vary every day, an extensive relationship system, and different timelines, AIKODE offers a fully-realized world where players can customize characters' clothing and hairstyle, play arcade games, decorate your home, cook, fish, and engage in a myriad of activities.

Everything is possible in AIKODE... except finding the truth.
